reviewText: This is the Citizen Kane of fishing movies. Adam Levine has been tabbed to play the lead in the reboot of the franchise.

This old classic video is for the fan of the old InFisherman programs with Al Lindner at the helm. This is the first video that I rented to learn something about musky fishing many years ago, before DVD, when I first started chasing muskies. It's just good fun, and there's still relevant information that a beginner would find helpful. You will learn about two popular jerk baits, using the wind to locate muskies, the figure 8 movement and other topics. And you get a look at some great musky fishing history as well.
A lot of really old footage cobbled together. Very "hokey" bits included, terrible acting. Still fun to watch though!
A MUST DVD IF YOU ARE A MUSKIE FANATIC LIKE ME!!!!!!!!!
GOOD VIDEO AND EDUCATIVE FOR RELEASY ALL FISH TO CONSERVATIVE

It is a Poor quality VHS converted film.
It doesn't show much of fishing.
It is all stuff from the 1970's..
